Html: I'm at school and have my Mac and Android and I'd rather use it on my Mac. I can't find the ROM in Android. Where is it?

The ROM is stored in the app's data folder. I believe the path resolves to /data/data/com.Revsoft.Wabbitemu/files.

BuckeyeDude
I don't see anything there. /data is empty and /sdcard/data has titaniumbackup and nothing else.

I believe /data requires root access to read.

BuckeyeDude
Ok, got it now. So I just copy the .sav to dropbox, and load it into the Mac version?

ok so the .sav crashes the Mac version. I loaded up the ROM from my PC and the buttons are not synchronized to the "hitbox". clicking Clear inputs a 4, for example. Does this actually work for Mac? :/
